DOC.brief_summary: The study purpose compare EDWARDS INTUITY valve system commercially available stented aortic bioprostheses , patient require aortic valve replacement surgery coronary artery bypass .
DOC.brief_title: EDWARDS INTUITY Valve System CADENCE Study
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study compare cross-clamp time ( XCT ) cardiopulmonary bypass time ( CPBT ) EDWARDS INTUITY valve system commercially available stented aortic bioprosthesis , patient logistic EuroSCORE 1 ≥ 8 undergoing elective surgical aortic valve replacement surgery concomitant coronary bypass graft . Additionally , aim gather sufficient data quantify effect size short term patient benefit outcome previously identify literature finally explore additional healthcare resource utilization health economic endpoint .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : ≥18 year age aortic stenosis / mixed aortic stenosis aortic insufficiency SAVR+CABG ( 14 distal anastomosis ) Log . EuroSCORE ≥6 NYHA Class ≤II Exclusion ( i.a . ) : pure aortic insufficiency preexist prosthetic heart valve ring congenital true bicuspid / unicuspid aortic valve LVEF < 20 %
